channel.title: Incorrect magic id : 46? when I try to login
channel.description:
Okay so im using Hyperion source and I'm trying to use DeathlyPvpz v4 or v3 client with it but anytime I try to login the client says "No response from loginserver" and I get the error below inside cmd. Are they just not compatible together? The only reason i think that they are compatible is because the same thing happens except the cmd says "Encrypted id != 10" when i try to run DeathlyPvpz v4 source with the v4 client which really confused me so i decided to try the v3 source with the v4 client and it worked perfect, the only thing is I don't want to use the shitty v4 source I want to use hyperion source. If anyone can help I'd appreciate it, I just don't know what these errors mean nor how to fix them.
CMD ERROR:
May 28, 2014 7:13:46 AM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Ready May 28, 2014 7:27:05 AM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode INFO: Incorrect magic id : 46 May 28, 2014 7:27:07 AM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode INFO: Incorrect magic id : 46 May 28, 2014 7:27:09 AM org.hyperion.rs2.net.RS2LoginDecoder doDecode INFO: Incorrect magic id : 46

item.title: Incorrect magic id : 46? when I try to login
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

ohokay:

Check the login protocol of the server and what data it expects. The client isn’t sending the correct data.

Where would the login protocol be? here I took pictures of the login files:
Also, so your saying they are compatible together?

  • LoginServerConnector.java
  • LoginServerWorldLoader.java

[URL=http://s1251.photobucket.com/user/wthsquids/media/loginpics_zpsfda324e5.png.html][/URL]

  • LoginCodeFactory.java
  • LoginDecoder.java
  • LoginEncoder.java
  • LoginPacket.java

[URL=http://s1251.photobucket.com/user/wthsquids/media/loginpics2_zps2ea99a37.png.html][/URL]

Read full topic
